description:
Beautiful and Cozy Studio Alcove Apt., in the heart of Midtown. Totally remodeled.  Gorgeous Pre-War Building on fabulous street, secured entry, apartment located in first floor with 3 large windows. 
Short Walking distance to:
-Broadway Theaters, Central Park, Columbus Circle, 
major Subway Stations, The Met, Broadway, 9th Avenue, Amsterdam, many many great Restaurants. 
GREAT APT AT AN AFFORDABLE PRICE FOR NEW YORK CITY.
name: MIDTOWN STUDIO ALCOVE / THEATERS/ COLUMBUS CIRCLE
review: Logement super bien placé pour arpenter Manhattan ..métro juste à côté ...Central Park à 2 pas ...
